statusBar.switchBotWarning: Switch to another bot. You will leave this interface.
statusBar.switchLang: Change the bot content language. Currently editing: {currentLang}

config.confirmChangeLanguage: Are you sure you want to change the language of your bot from {currentName} to {newName}? All of your content elements will be copied, make sure you translate them.
config.confirmUnmount: Are you sure want to unmount this bot? All of the functionalities of this bot will become unavailable.
config.avatarUploadSuccess: The bot avatar has been uploaded successfully. You need to save the form in order for the changes to take effect.
config.coverUploadSuccess: The cover picture has been uploaded successfully. You need to save the form in order for the changes to take effect.

content.noContentDefined: We think you don't have any content types defined.
content.pleaseReadDoc: Please {readTheDocs} to see how you can make use of this feature
content.confirmDeleteItem: Do you really want to delete {count, number} {count, plural, one {item} other {items}}?
content.noContentYet: There's no content yet. You can create some using the 'Add' button.
content.mustBeDefaultLang: Content element must be created in your default language first.

import.notAbleToExtractData: We were not able to extract any data from your file. Either the file is empty, or it doesn't match any known format.
import.missingContentTypes: Your bot is missing these content types: {types}.
import.selectFileMore: Select a JSON file. It must be exported from the Content page. You will see a summary of modifications when clicking on Next
import.compareNbElements: Your file contains {fileCmsCount} content elements, while this bot contains {cmsCount} elements.
import.whatLikeDo: What would you like to do?
import.updateMissing: Update or create missing elements present in my file
import.clearExisting: Clear all existing elements, then import those from my file

flow.unauthUpdate: Unauthorized flow update. You have insufficient role privileges to modify flows.
flow.errorWhileSaving: There was an error while saving, deleting or renaming a flow. Last modification might not have been saved on server. Please reload page before continuing flow edition
flow.nowSaveAuto: Pssst! Flows now save automatically, no need to save anymore.
flow.cantDeleteStart: You can't delete the start node.
flow.cantDeleteSuccess: You can't delete the success node.
flow.cantDeleteFailure: You can't delete the failure node.

topicList.confirmDeleteFlow: Are you sure you want to delete the flow {name}?
topicList.confirmDeleteTopic: Are you sure you want to delete the topic {name}?
topicList.flowsAssociatedDelete: {warning} {count} flows associated with the topic will be deleted
topicList.nbQuestionsInTopic: Number of questions in that topic
topicList.nbTriggersInWorkflow: Number of NLU triggers on that workflow

topicEditor.dontExisteWillCreate: These elements don't exist and will be created
topicEditor.alreadyExistButDifferent: These elements already exist but are different
topicEditor.unknownFileType: Unknown file type or invalid format
topicEditor.willBeOverwritten: An element with that name already exist. Content will be overwritten
topicEditor.willBeCreated: This element doesn't exist and will be created
topicEditor.noChangesToApply: There are no changes to apply, or everything in the file is identical to the existing content
topicEditor.topicNameHelp: Choose a broad name to represent your topic, for example HR or IT. You can rename it later

condition.confirmDeleteCondition: Are you sure to delete this condition?

workflow.name: Workflow name
workflow.labelHelp: The label is a friendly name that can replace the name in the topic list

sidePanel.flowNameHelp: It can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and hyphens. You can also use slashes to create folders (ex: myfolder/mynewflow)
sidePanel.flowNamePlaceholder: Choose a name for your flow
sidePanel.nameInUseMessage: A flow with that name already exists. Please choose another one.
sidePanel.confirmDeleteFlow: Are you sure you want to delete the flow {name}

toolbar.problemsWithFlow: There are some problems with your flow.
toolbar.renamingAndDeletingDisabled: Renaming and Deleting flows is disabled
toolbar.whenErrorEncountered: When an error is encountered in the flow, the user is redirected here
toolbar.whenDiscussionTimeouts: When a discussion timeouts (user doesn't answer in the configured timeframe) he will be redirected here.

skills.error: ERROR – Skill "{size}" is an invalid size for Skill window. Valid sizes are {sizes}.

node.actionServerTooltip: This is the action server on which the action will be executed
node.errorInServer: There seems to be an error in your Botpress server. Please contact your administrator.
node.errorListingActions: Error listing actions from the action server
node.errorListingActionsMore: There was an error while trying to get the list of actions on the selected server
node.noActionsFound: No actions found on this action server
node.actionsRegisteredOnServer: Actions are registered on the server-side. Read about how to register new actions by searching for `bp.registerActions()`.
node.youCanChangeActions: You can change how the Action is executed by providing it parameters. Some parameters are required, some are optional.
node.confirmOverwriteParameters: Do you want to overwrite existing parameters?
node.unknownParameterType: ⚠️ Unknown parameter type ({type}). This parameter will be ignored.

transition.mustSelectSubflow: You must select a subflow to transition to

module.notProperlyRegistered: The module is not properly registered
module.tryingToLoad: It seems like you are trying to load a module that has not been registered. Please make sure the module is registered then restart the bot.
